author: madeof_tin7509
content: Throwing in some dates/times. Thumbs up to ones that for work for you.

author: madeof_tin7509
content: And which time zone are you?

author: madeof_tin7509
content: The traditional time is around 16:00 UTC, but that is for both EU and US participation.

author: hmijail
content: Hey hey, Australia here ;P. Brisbane, AEST

author: hmijail
content: 16:00 UTC is midnight here, so I'd vote for something else

author: hmijail
content: ... and relatedly, it's hard to make sense of the day without a timezone, but I'd tentatively vote "Tuesday", which might mean my Wednesday

author: pipermerriam
content:
I spent some more time writing up details of what I think a DHT based network would look like, based on my previous experiments a few months back.

https://notes.ethereum.org/EYRD1-NZQ5aVRCsM4fg92Q

Astute readers will note there is a big gaping hole around accounts and storage that needs to be figured out.  I'm hoping this can serve as either a starting point for specifying something DHT based if there is agreement on that direction, or can help inform alternate proposals for how this network is built.
